Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view

Class TerminalView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.view.TerminalView
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionView, LoginView, LoginWaitingRoom, PlayerStateView, TableView
public abstract class TerminalView extends Object
An abstract class that represents a view object interacting with the Terminal It is used to build a CLI that can accept input from the user and display strings using the Terminal

  • Field Details

    • terminalScanner

      private final Scanner terminalScanner

  • Constructor Details

    • TerminalView

      public TerminalView()
      Default Terminal View constructor. It initializes the objects for reading input from the Terminal and subscribes the object to the Network Timeout notification, so that the CLI can properly terminate if the Network reports a timeout

  • Method Details

    • getTerminalScanner

      public Scanner getTerminalScanner()
      Retrieves the scanner used to read input from the Terminal
      Returns:
      (type Scanner) The scanner used to read input from the Terminal

    • run

      public abstract void run()
      Abstract method where subclasses will start their operations (e.g. start reading input from command line)

    • didReceiveNetworkTimeoutNotification

      protected abstract void didReceiveNetworkTimeoutNotification(Notification notification)
      Abstract callback where subclasses can customize the behavior in response to network timout notifications
      Parameters:
      notification - (type Notification) the network timeout notification
